pullRequest.title: Issue 5388: Enhancements to Integration test utility ClusterWrapper
pullRequest.bodyText:
Change log description
Enhance ClusterWrapper to include support for Controller REST API, rename initialize() to start() and add usage examples.
Purpose of the change
Resolves #5388.
What the code does

Adds support for enabling Controller REST interface.
Renames initialize() method to start() .
Add some more integration tests for demonstration in ClusterWrapperTest.
Rearranges some code in the ClusterWrapper to collocate all public methods.

How to verify it
All integration tests must pass.

commit.message:
Add support for REST APIs, examples and rename initialize operation

Signed-off-by: rsharda <ravi.sharda@emc.com>

Add a method to extract ZK connect string, and collocate public and private methods.

Signed-off-by: rsharda <ravi.sharda@emc.com>

nodes.bodyText: Why did you move this method? I have another PR in flight touching this class and it's going to conflict with this one because of this change
Do any of these need cleaning up?
